nodes.bodyText:
any reason to use withUI here than withRequest?
Also can we add an afterEach to reset test user so begin state of a new test is same always.

@bsrikan I have changed the login to withRequest, Scenarios.json has three test suites in total and each test suite has a seperate beforeEach which logs in with required roles, not sure how afterEach is helpful ?
You are right, maybe not needed if there is only one test. Its just a safer approach.
